1562900.name: PYTHIAN: Masters of Hardcore XR
1562900.description:
On March 27th of 2021, the first live experience will take place within PYTHIAN. Masters of Hardcore will present a one hour experience that transports you back to the 2016’s event theme: Raiders of Rampage. A VR experience including the hardest live sets by Angerfist, Miss K8, Mad Dog & DRS and virtually rave with people from all over the world.

“Obey the noise of the visionary. The world never saw them coming”.

During this live experience you will be taken into the virtual world of Masters of Hardcore - Raiders of Rampage. From a first person perspective you move through this thematic world in mighty Viking ships, from the battlefields to the courtyards. On the way you can check out exclusive live sets with superior shows, and you have the opportunity to meet up with your friends, interact with fans from all over the world and do various activities. After the "live experience" you relive it at any time.

Scene 1 - The Journey (with Miss K8)
Gather on the ship for a ruthless rampage. The most vicious female warrior in hardcore history will guide you through the first part of this majestic journey.

Scene 2 - The Landing (with Mad Dog)
On the frontline fights a furious warrior. Take your arms and follow the lead of Mad Dog.

Scene 3 - The Forest (with DRS)
After the landing get ready to crash the gate and follow the path of destruction with DRS.

Scene 4 - The Courtyard (with Angerfist)
Submit, strike and raise your first. Witness the final deathblow by Angerfist.
1562900.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
